synopsis.text: Satomi Maiya's debut project during her first year at the esteemed Tokyo University of the Arts' Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation, unfolds a poignant tale of sibling rivalry and maternal affection. In this narrative, a young girl grapples with feelings of jealousy towards her newborn sister, who seems to have captured all of their mother's attention. Overwhelmed by these emotions, the girl makes a drastic decision, plunging her baby sister into darkness. This thought-provoking animation invites viewers to delve into complex human emotions and the consequences of our actions.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
